name: EUROPÄISCHE FAHRLEHRER ASSOZIATION
legal: EFA is a voluntary association registered in Bielefeld Germany - Registration Number: 20 VR 2164
membership: We are members of European Transport Safety Council (ETSC) https://etsc.eu/
goal:
Harmonization of the education and the examination of driving instructors and/or teachers

Preparation and harmonization of curriculum and educational concepts for the training of all categories of drivers

Preparation and harmonization of curriculum for the advanced training of all categories of drivers
Harmonization of the education and the examination of drivers

Harmonization of the standards of the examination organizations and driving examiners
interests: Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
EFA is a non-governmental association that has represented driving school and driving instructor associations in Europe since 1983.

It has always been a point of reference in Europe for driver and rider training. EFA is currently involved in the Simusafe Project (simusafe.eu) to understand how to better use simu-lators in driving training.
